title: Recommendation to Pray for Hajj
description: A narration from Imam al-Sadiq (a.s.) instructing believers to specifically supplicate for the opportunity to perform Hajj every night of Ramadan after the Maghrib prayer.

preamble.arabic: وروى السيّد ابن طاووس في الإقبال عن أبي بصير أنّ الإمام الصادق عليه السلام قال:
preamble.english: Sayyid Ibn Tawus narrated in *al-Iqbal* on the authority of Abu Basir that Imam al-Sadiq (peace be upon him) said:

phrases.arabic: ادْعُ للحَجِّ فِي لَيالِي شَهْرِ رَمَضانَ بَعْدَ المَغْرِبِ»(2).
phrases.english: Supplicate for the Pilgrimage during the nights of the month of Ramadan after the Maghrib prayer.
phrases.transliteration: Id‘u lil-ḥajji fī layālī shahri ramaḍāna ba‘da al-maghribi.
